articles.title: India vs Australia 4th T20I Live Score: Axar, Bishnoi help IND roar back after Head's explosive start - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India vs Australia 4th T20I Highlights: AUS were restricted to a total of 154/7 and IND have taken an unassailable 3-1 lead in the series.
articles.content: India vs Australia Live Score, IND vs AUS T20 Series: He has got the short end of the stick as far as injuries are concerned but he is back today. Chahar says that he took a break after the IPL and "… [+830 chars]
